name: fcpl
description: fcpl is a function programming language that transpiles to JavaScript. Its syntax is heavily inspired by CoffeeScript and F#.

name: RTP Documentation
description: A documentation website for "Ready to Program", a Java IDE from 1998 which is still being used in the Ontario education system today.

name: Grinch Simulator
description: The Grinch has no-clipped out of reality and into a desolate city! Help him steal presents and avoid being caught by Santa in this retro-horror inspired game.

name: Ant Colony Simulation
description: Ant colony optimization is a probablistic technique for finding the optimal path through a graph. This simulation provides a visual representation of how the algorithm functions.

name: Rocket Raider
description: Fly your space ship through a gauntlet of levels while dodging and weaving to avoid obstacles. Collect every space gem in every level to become the ultimate rocket raider.

name: Proto
description: The Earth has finally collapsed after decades of terrible pollution and irreversible human impacts. It is your final hope that you guide Proto, courier of the last remaining plant, to saftey.

name: Baron Berkely's
description: Baron Berkely's Best Bounty Hunting Hierarchy for Magical Creatures and Contaminant is recruiting new members. As a death eater, you look to silence the source of all magical life - The Mega Mushroom.

name: Brain Parser
description: Brain**** is a esoteric programming language whose source code only contains the characters '.,[]+-><'. Brain Parser builds onto Brain**** in order to make it easier to program with.

name: Wordle Bot
description: A python bot which is consistently able to solve Wordle problems in 4 guesses or less. Implemented with PyAutoGui, the bot will solve puzzles on the actual website.
